backend/main.mo: Implements streak tracking logic with authorization checks, updating streaks based on date comparisons and storing them per user.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence metadata mapping features to related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files including hooks, components, and shims.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap page mounting the React root element and loading the main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing navigation between home and learning pages with a theme provider and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation controls, logo, login button, and an authentication error banner.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper applying a textured background with an overlay and centered content area.
Displays an alert banner when Internet Identity login fails, showing the associated error message.
frontend/src/components/CompleteSectionB: Button for recording lesson completion with loading state and inline error display on mutation failure.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Dropdown selector showing language names and flags, allowing users to switch languages.
frontend/src/components/LessonSectionNav: Renders tab-based navigation for lesson sections, highlighting and switching between them.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication states and errors.
frontend/src/components/PronunciationCon: UI control to play or stop text-to-speech pronunciation per item using the speech synthesis hook.
frontend/src/components/StreakPanel.tsx: Displays the user’s daily streak data with loading, error, and unauthenticated states.
frontend/src/data/lessonsSeed.ts: Defines lesson data structures and English A1 lesson seed content with a helper for generating leveled lessons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching streak data and recording daily completion with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom hook for browser speech synthesis, supporting playback control, language selection, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base global styles.
frontend/src/lib/cefrLevels.ts: Defines CEFR level types and a list of level metadata with a default level.
frontend/src/lib/languages.ts: Provides a list of supported languages with codes, names, and flag paths.
frontend/src/lib/lessonContent.ts: Retrieves lesson content with fallbacks for missing languages, levels, or sections.
frontend/src/lib/lessonStructure.ts: Defines lesson section metadata such as IDs, labels, and descriptions.
frontend/src/lib/localDate.ts: Utilities for generating and formatting local date numbers used for streak tracking.
frontend/src/lib/speechSynthesisLanguage: Maps language codes to BCP‑47 tags for Web Speech API synthesis.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a grid of selectable languages with flags and names.
Main learning UI with language info, level selection, sections, and lesson content.
frontend/src/shims/processEnv.ts: Shims process.env for browser use with predefined environment variables.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Adds TypeScript type declarations for process.env in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining dark mode, content paths, extended color system, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing build/deploy failure issues and existing feature requirements.
